descripcion: In this project I developed the app for the phone to use it as a microphone and some of the features of the game. The studio were was created this game is WildSphere.

Gigantosaurus es un juego de carreras de plataformas en el que tomas el control de cuatro amigos: Rocky, Tiny, Mazu y Bill. Juntos resolverán acertijos y superarán situaciones para avanzar al siguiente nivel.


Url: https://www.youtube.com/embed/bAwn30euRgY?si=JcUqVfqZwTkQDBPj
In this project I developed the app for the phone to use it as a microphone and some of the features of the game. The studio were was created this game is WildSphere.
